comment:
Nose: Yeast, toasted barley.

Palate: Very honeyed and floral, with wood spices on the back of the palate. 

Body and finish: Full and heavy, with a long finish - the ABV really does this whisky justice.

“There is a special place in hell reserved for people who waste good scotch, but I must say, damn good scotch sir.”
-LT Archie Hitchcock
Tried this at the whisky extravaganza. Great stuff. Fruity, spicy, woody, and has notes of caramel. Very balanced.
Strong with a nice finish.  Not very sweet.
